thread.title: NCERT Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for DTP Operator & MTS Posts
thread.title_full: NCERT Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for DTP Operator & MTS Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: NCERT Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for DTP Operator & MTS Posts

organizations.name: department of education in social sciences
national council of educational research and training

text: NCERT Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for DTP Operator & MTS Posts NCERT Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for DTP Operator & MTS Posts: Department of Education in Social Sciences, National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) has invited applications for the recruitment of DTP Operator & MTS (Project Helper) vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates may walk in on 23, 24-03-2017 at 11:00 am. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… NCERT Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. DTP Operator: 01 Post 2. MTS (Project Helper): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should not be more than 30 years as on 23-03-2017. Age relaxation is applicable for SC/ ST candidates by 5 years, 3 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Post Graduation in any discipline, Diploma in DTP with relevant experience for Post 1, Matriculate, can read & write Hindi & English languages for Post 2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on skill test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may walk in along with bio-data, original mark sheets/ crtificates, one set of attested copies of certificates/ testimonials, one passport size photo on 23, 24-03-2017 at 11:00 am. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview for Post 1: 23-03-2017 at 11:00 am. Date & Time of Interview for Post 2: 24-03-2017 at 11:00 am. Venue: Room No.11, Third Floor, Janaki Ammal Block, NCERT, Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi – 110016. For more details like tenure, fellowship& other information click on the link given below…
